articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: Its resilience on full display, USMNT denies Costa Rica to reach Gold Cup semis - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Americans lost their second-half lead, but keeper Matt Freese starred in the shootout as his team prevailed, 4-3, following a 2-2 draw.
articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS A young U.S. mens national soccer team lost its poise late in regulation, then momentarily in the heat of a shootout. But with a Concacaf Gold Cup semifinal berth at stake, the Americans … [+6001 chars]

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Deaths from heart attacks are way down. Here's what's killing us instead - KSL News
articles.description: Heart disease is the leading cause of death around the world. However, overall heart disease death rates over the past five decades dropped by 66% in American adults age 25 and older, according to a new study.
articles.content: ATLANTA Heart disease is the leading cause of death around the world. However, overall heart disease death rates over the past five decades dropped by 66% in American adults ages 25 and older, accord… [+3366 chars]

articles.title: CIA chief told lawmakers Iran nuclear program set back years with strikes on metal conversion site - AP News
articles.description: CIA Director John Ratcliffe has told skeptical U.S. lawmakers that American military strikes destroyed Iran’s lone metal conversion facility and delivered a monumental setback to Tehran’s nuclear program that will take years to overcome. That's according to a…
